text: Ramesh Mhatre () is Shiv Sena politician from Dombivali, Maharashtra. He is elected as chairman of the standing committee of the Kalyan-Dombivali Municipal Corporation (KDMC) on 3 January 2017. He has been elected as chairman of the standing committee for fourth term. ==Positions held== * 2000: Elected as corporator in Kalyan-Dombivali Municipal Corporation * 2003: Elected as Standing Committee Chairman of Kalyan-Dombivali Municipal Corporation * 2004: Elected as Standing Committee Chairman of Kalyan-Dombivali Municipal Corporation * 2005: Re-elected as corporator in Kalyan-Dombivali Municipal Corporation * 2010: Re-elected as corporator in Kalyan-Dombivali Municipal Corporation * 2015: Elected as Standing Committee Chairman of Kalyan-Dombivali Municipal Corporation * 2015: Re-elected as corporator in Kalyan-Dombivali Municipal Corporation * 2017: Elected as Standing Committee Chairman of Kalyan-Dombivali Municipal Corporation ==References== ==External links== * Shiv Sena Home Page Category:Living people Category:Marathi politicians Category:Shiv Sena politicians Category:21st-century Indian politicians Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Ramesh Mhatre
